title: L'Espiga d'Or Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out, Spanish
description: Located at the back of a very extensive health food shop. Offers both take-out and dine-in. Daily changing menu with a range of wholesome meals, including stews, rice dishes, veggie burgers and more, with some vegan choices. Serves a range of desserts made with spelt flour. Wi-fi.
